translation.en: -I had to keep him away from you. -You lied to me.
-He raped you. -He didn't. I believe him.
translation.ko: - 널 강간했던 놈이야 - 아니야, 난 제이를 믿어

translation.en: They got the results for the DNA test before the mist even came. It was him!
translation.ko: DNA 검사 결과가 나왔댔어 이 자식이라고!

translation.en: Did you see the other people?
I don't think they will understand.
They haven't seen what we've seen.
Then they will have seen something else.
They haven't seen you survive the mist.
translation.ko: 사람들은 당신이 미스트 속에서 살아남았다는 걸 못 봤어요

translation.en: You're ashamed of what you're going to do.
translation.ko: 당신이 곧 하게 될 일을 부끄러워하고 있군요

translation.en: This is the last of the rations.
-Keep your voice down. -Why? You don't think they will find out?
translation.ko: - 목소리 낮춰요 - 어차피 다 알게 될 텐데요

translation.en: Or we start sending people out on food runs.
translation.ko: 사람들을 보내 음식을 찾게 될 때든지 말이죠

translation.en: I was hoping my son would be here.
Maybe we'll go to my office.
-Things haven't exactly been good here. -Things haven't been good anywhere.
translation.ko: - 여기 상황이 좋지 않았어요 - 어디나 그렇죠

translation.en: You know me. You know I only try to do what's best for everybody.
translation.ko: 제가 모두의 이득을 위해 노력하는 거 알지 않습니까

translation.en: I just want people to get along.
Eve Copeland locked him up in a storage room.
Then we locked Eve Copeland and her daughter up with him.
translation.ko: 지금은 이브와 그 딸도 같이 갇혀 있어요

translation.en: [sighs] As I said, it's been hard.
The Copeland girl killed a woman.
People want justice. I-I just wanna help them.
translation.ko: 사람들은 정의를 원하고 나는 그걸 도우려던 거였어요

translation.en: We just wanna ask the Copelands to find another place to be
translation.ko: 코프랜드 모녀에게 다른 곳에 있으라고 한 겁니다

translation.en: You taking the law into your own hands, huh?
translation.ko: 법은 당신 멋대로 주무를 수 있는 게 아닙니다

translation.en: It's not illegal to throw people out.
When this whole thing is over...
we'll all have done things we won't be proud of.
translation.ko: 모든 사람이 부끄러운 일 한두 가지는 했을 겁니다

translation.en: we've just gotta get to the when.
translation.ko: 이 상황부터 끝나야 할 거 아닙니까

translation.en: and I won't interfere with how you run your mall.
I don't know what the fuck we're waiting for.
Can someone tell me what the fuck we're waiting for?
translation.ko: 우리는 대체 왜 기다리고 있는 겁니까?

translation.en: Adrian said you got shot in the head.
W-W-W-Wait. What's going on? What the fuck happened?
translation.ko: 무슨 일이에요? 대체 뭔 일이 있었죠?

translation.en: -What? -When I figured it out, he knocked me out.
There's that big group down by the fountain,
translation.ko: 분수 근처에 사람들이 많이 모여 있는데

translation.en: Yeah, I saw that group, too. They look pretty unstable.
translation.ko: 나도 봤어요 다들 꽤 불안해 보이던데

translation.en: He left while I was asleep.
translation.ko: 내가 자는 동안에 어디 갔나 봐요

translation.en: He's probably looking for Adrian. We've gotta find them. Both of them.
translation.ko: 에이드리언을 찾나 봐요 둘 다 찾아야 해요

translation.en: -I'll take one floor. You, the next. -OK.
We'll meet back in the middle.
then tell me who I am.
I'm not the person you wanna talk to.
I'm not gonna hurt you, sir.
Dr. Bruin told us to be careful.
Is she the woman who tortured me?
She's the reason you're alive, sir.
Why do you keep calling me "sir"?
If I'm you're superior, then release me.
I order you to release me.
You have to help us. They're gonna kill us.
But you two need to come with us.
Dad, we have to go back for Eve and Alex. They're gonna kill them.
translation.ko: 그 두 사람에게 돌아가야 해요 사람들이 죽일 거라고요

translation.en: -Do you know what's happening out there? -It's the Black Spring.
We should go back. Get Eve and Alex.
You're gonna have to trust me.
And I am so proud of you.
You are the best thing that ever happened to me.
-Dad, what's going on? -You need to come here now.
translation.ko: - 아빠, 대체 왜 그러세요? - 어서 여기로 와 보렴

translation.en: You just have to trust me.
What? What are you talking about?
-It's not your fault. It's not your fault. -What is she doing?
translation.ko: - 네 잘못이 아니야 - 잠깐, 뭐 하시는 거예요?

translation.en: I'm your son! What are you doing? Let me in!
translation.ko: 난 아빠 자식이잖아요! 대체 뭐예요, 열어 줘요!

translation.en: It may not have taken him yet.
Losing someone you love can be so beautiful.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 사람을 잃는 건 아름다운 일일 수도 있어요

translation.en: We're just making sure this is a safe space for everyone to be
translation.ko: 미스트가 없어질 때까지 여기가 안전해야 하잖아요

translation.en: Are you insane? We haven't hurt anyone!
translation.ko: 미쳤어요? 우린 해 끼친 적 없어요!

translation.en: Shelley saw you making out with the boy you accused of rape!
translation.ko: 널 강간했다는 놈이랑 어울렸다고 셸리가 그러던데

translation.en: Maybe she didn't what? Didn't mean it?
Is that why you lied about surviving in the mist?
translation.ko: 그래서 혼자 살았을 때 거짓말한 거야?

translation.en: You know what? Maybe Shelley was right.
Maybe you are a part of it.
I have fought too many assholes like you to give up that power freely. Come on!
translation.ko: 당신 같은 놈들 힘을 뺏으려고 내가 얼마나 많이 싸워왔는데!

translation.en: We have the right to defend ourselves!
How could you do that to her?
translation.ko: 내 딸한테 어떻게 그럴 수 있냐고!

translation.en: Please, please, please, please... Please stop.
I know where they're keeping Eve and Alex.
translation.ko: 이브 아줌마랑 앨릭스가 어디 있는지 알아요
- 친구들을 버릴 순 없어 - 무슨 친구들요?

translation.en: People I met, who helped me get here.
These are people you've known for five days. I've known you for eight years.
You have no idea, do you?
You have no idea who you are.
-Don't you wanna know who you are? -Tell me.
translation.ko: - 당신 정체를 알고 싶잖아요 - 말해 봐

translation.en: You can't. They can never know. Do you understand?
translation.ko: 그 사람들은 알면 안 돼요 알겠어요?

translation.en: If you care for them, they can never know.
translation.ko: 그들이 소중하다면 알아서는 안 되는 거라고요

translation.en: He's alive and he needs our help.
translation.ko: 케빈은 살아 있고 우리가 도와줘야 해요

translation.en: This guy can help me find out who I am.
translation.ko: 저 사람이 내 정체를 아는 데 도움이 될 거예요

translation.en: I have to go with him.
-What the fuck are you talking about? -You have to go.
What? We... Let's just help him. Then we can all go together.
translation.ko: 그냥 케빈 도와주고 그다음에 다 같이 가면 되죠

translation.en: Part of your rules, as well?
[Gus] She was going to break the rules!
Whoever endangers the group has to leave the mall.
translation.ko: 무리를 위험하게 한 자는 여기서 나간다

translation.en: -[man 1] She has to. -I'm not letting you throw her out.
I'm sorry, but those are the rules!
You have to help us. Stop this.
No, Connor's staying out of this. I can throw out anybody I want.
translation.ko: 코너는 이 일에 관여 못 해요 난 누구든 내보낼 수 있어요

translation.en: -He doesn't have to do anything. -Yes, he does! Connor...
translation.ko: - 코너가 나설 필요는 없죠 - 아니에요! 코너...

translation.en: I was already pregnant when I met Kevin.
translation.ko: 케빈을 만나기 전에 난 이미 임신 중이었어

translation.en: He didn't wanna know who it was. He thought it was better that way.
translation.ko: 네 생부를 궁금해하지 않았지 그게 더 낫다고 생각했거든

translation.en: There's a reason you couldn't be with Jay.
translation.ko: 네가 제이랑 엮이면 안 되는 이유가 있어

translation.en: After everything else they've lied about,
you expect us to trust this?
You would have said something before. You would have said something!
translation.ko: 그 전에 말할 수 있었잖아요 말해줄 수 있었잖아요!

translation.en: You loved Dad so much. We couldn't take it away from you.
translation.ko: 넌 아빠를 정말 좋아했잖니 네 아빠를 어떻게 뺏어가겠어

translation.en: There's no place here for people like you.
Now he didn't do it? Which is it?
You've all lost your fucking mind.
Connor, please. Please! She's your daughter.
-Where are they? -Let me go and I'll tell you.
translation.ko: - 어디 있는데? - 풀어 주면 말해 주죠

translation.en: I don't even know if I'm gonna let you live.
translation.ko: 널 살려 둬야 할지도 확신이 안 서는데?

translation.en: Remember what I told Nash in the psych ward?
translation.ko: 정신 병동에서 내시에게 했던 말 기억해?

translation.en: that there will be no salvation.
But if you tell me where my family is,
translation.ko: 하지만 내 가족들이 어디 있는지 말해 주면

translation.en: then maybe, just maybe, I will stop before you die.
translation.ko: 네가 죽기 전에 내가 행동을 멈출지도 모르지

translation.en: They're gonna throw her out of the mall.
Come on. Let's go. Let's go!
Please let us walk out together.
I am not gonna let this place fall into chaos!
translation.ko: 여기를 혼돈의 도가니로 만들 순 없어요!

translation.en: And chaos is what you bring.
This is our one chance at safety. I know you.
translation.ko: 우리 안전을 위한 마지막 기회예요, 나 알잖아요

translation.en: Not much of a family, huh!
[Gus] Get the door! Get the door!
We have a car to the back of the mall.
Go find the truck and bring it here!
-[Eve] Get in the car! -Let go! Jay!
-[Kevin] Eve, get in the car! -[Alex screams]
You're doing the right thing, sir.
Do you know what it is out there?
The doctor will have answers for you.
I want you to know that.
Who told you I was dead?
I don't wanna be near these people.
Once they are dead, it will be gone.
First through the moth, and then the spider.
Showed me what had to be done.
A forest ranger I knew, he...
A mother bear who had given birth.
She had given birth to three cubs.
translation.ko: 어미 곰은 새끼를 세 마리 낳았죠

translation.en: The rangers kept an eye on the cubs
to make sure they wouldn't be injured by other predators.
-What are you doing? -Put your seat belts on now.
Come on. Get in the car. Come on.
Inland is left. We could do either.
translation.ko: 인랜드는 왼쪽 아무 데나 가도 돼요

translation.en: Let's get out of this town. It can't be all over.
translation.ko: 이 마을을 벗어나죠 미스트가 사방에 있겠어요?

translation.en: -It can't be everywhere. -How do you know?
translation.ko: - 그럴 리는 없어요 - 그걸 어떻게 알아요?

translation.en: -[Mia] Where are you going? -[Kevin] Station. We can get there first.
translation.ko: - 어디 가? - 기차보다 먼저 역에 가야지

translation.en: [Eve] Sure this is a good idea?
Maybe it can get us out of here.
Are you crazy? We run. They can rescue us.
